definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_block</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon minecraft:creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0s,ExplosionRadius:10b}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_specific_potion_effect"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">effect give @p minecraft:resistance 3 255</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
